name: Mechaderby
description:
3rd version of a simple 1v1 game jam prototype inspired by roller derby. Originally wanted to use Unity, but final version is in Godot. Ran out of time for AI, looking up sound effects, and a time limit with final scoring, so 2 players required and play as long as you want.

Player 1:

W & S keys for forward and back. A & D for turning.

Player 2:

Up and down keys for forward and back. Left and right keys for turning.

Get points by forcing your opponent out of the arena, or by getting into the scoring zone of the opposing color. Grab a chainsaw and try to force your opponent into your blockers if you can.
